datamodel

Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • datamodel.Person
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Customer

    public abstract class Person
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents the "abstract concept" of a person in the Fast Courier Service application
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Person()
      Default constructor, initialises both forename and surname to "UNKNOWN".
      Person(java.lang.String forename, java.lang.String surname)
      Constructs an object with the provided forename and surname

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getForename()
      Accessor method to retrieve the persons forename
      java.lang.String getFullName()
      This method retrieves the persons full name in the format forename [SPACE] surname

      Accessor method to retrieve the persons surname

      Accessor method to set the persons forename
